item.title: 分析师追赶现实，英伟达预测魔力褪去
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）超预期的业绩令大多数公司羡慕不已，但在两年内股价涨幅超过 800% 之后，"好 "对华尔街来说已不再是好事。【原文：Nvidia Corp.’s estimate-beating results would be the envy of most companies, but after a more than 800% share-price gain in two years, great is no longer good enough for Wall Street.】

item.title: 科威特将斥资 300 多亿美元提高石油产量以满足需求
item.description: 科威特石油公司计划在五年内斥资约 100 亿第纳尔（约合 330 亿美元）提高石油生产能力，并将赌注押在未来几十年的强劲需求上。【原文：Kuwait Petroleum Corp. plans to spend about 10 billion dinars ($33 billion) over five years to ramp up oil production capacity, betting on robust demand for decades to come.】

item.title: 迪尔预计 2025 年利润将下降，农民仍不消费
item.description: 世界顶级农用机械制造商迪尔公司（Deere & Co.【原文：Deere & Co., the world’s top farm machinery maker, expects lower-than-expected profits next year with few signs that growers are ready to start buying more tractors.】

item.title: 经历动荡的一年，盈利受到影响，Worldline 将举借新债
item.description: Worldline SA 已开始进行再融资，这将增加这家陷入困境的金融科技公司的利息支出，但会带来一些急需的现金，以帮助支付即将到期的债务。【原文：Worldline SA has embarked on a refinancing exercise that will increase the embattled fintech firm’s interest bill but bring in some much-needed cash to help cover upcoming debt maturities.】

item.title: 预算紧张局势令市场惶恐不安，法国债券风险上升
item.description: 由于市场担心法国的预算谈判和即将到来的主权评级审查，一项衡量法国债券风险的指标飙升至一个月来的最高点。【原文：A gauge of French bond risk surged to its highest in a month as markets fret about the country’s budget negotiations and a looming review of its sovereign rating.】

item.title: 土耳其维持利率不变，预示通胀放缓将导致降息
item.description: 土耳其央行连续第八个月维持基准利率不变，但暗示通胀放缓可能很快成为降息的理由。【原文：The Turkish central bank left its benchmark interest rate unchanged for an eighth month, but implied slowing inflation could soon justify a cut.】

item.title: LVMH Scion 提出将巴黎足球俱乐部推向巅峰的计划
item.description: 安托万-阿尔诺（Antoine Arnault）是其父领导的 LVMH 奢侈品帝国的继承人，他计划将二线足球俱乐部巴黎足球俱乐部（Paris FC）打造成卡塔尔支持的巴黎圣日耳曼（Paris Saint-Germain）的竞争对手。【原文：Antoine Arnault, the scion of the LVMH luxury empire led by his father, plans to turn second-tier football club Paris FC into a rival for Qatar-backed Paris Saint-Germain.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴任命新任电子商务主管，全面改革停滞不前的业务部门
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）任命了一位资深高管负责整个在线电子商务业务，开始对这一规模庞大但陷入困境的业务进行大刀阔斧的改革。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. has appointed a veteran executive the overseer of its entire online e-commerce operation, setting in motion a major overhaul of a vast but struggling business.】

item.title: 英国航空公司取消取消已有 90 年历史的巴林航线计划
item.description: 英国航空公司（British Airways Plc）在公众的强烈反对声中放弃了取消巴林长期航线的计划，该公司正在调整其网络，以适应其波音公司 787 Dreamliner 飞机的发动机问题。【原文：British Airways Plc dropped plans to ax its longstanding route to Bahrain amid a public backlash, as the carrier alters its network to accommodate engine issues on its Boeing Co. 787 Dreamliner aircraft.】

item.title: 据说 Uber 正在洽谈投资中国 Pony AI 在美国的首次公开募股
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，优步科技公司计划投资 Pony AI 公司在美国的首次公开募股，该公司的规模被自动驾驶公司扩大后，预计将于下周定价。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. plans to invest in Pony AI Inc.’s US initial public offering, which is expected to be priced next week after being upsized by the autonomous driving firm, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 新德里可汗市场跻身全球最昂贵的商业街之列
item.description: 在印度经济强劲增长的推动下，印度首都新德里的高档零售区可汗市场（Khan Market）跻身全球最昂贵的高档零售商场之列。【原文：Khan Market, an upscale retail area in the Indian capital New Delhi, retained its position among the costliest high-street retail destinations worldwide buoyed by the nation’s strong economic growth.】

item.title: 立陶宛议员支持帕卢卡斯出任下一任总理
item.description: 立陶宛立法者支持社会民主党人金陶塔斯-帕卢卡斯（Gintautas Paluckas）担任波罗的海国家的下一任总理，批准他组建新政府。【原文：Lithuanian lawmakers backed Social Democrat Gintautas Paluckas as the Baltic nation’s next prime minister, giving him approval to form a new government.】

item.title: 在 "疲软 "经济中，德国央行对商业地产保持警惕
item.description: 德国央行表示，在经济前景不佳的情况下，金融监管机构正在密切关注贷款人和投资者因商业地产风险而面临的风险。【原文：Germany’s central bank said financial regulators are keeping a close watch on risks to lenders and investors from their exposure to commercial property amid a poor economic outlook.】

item.title: Klarna 计划上市为更多金融科技公司上市铺平道路
item.description: Klarna Bank AB 计划首次公开募股，这让人们更加希望金融科技公司上市的长期干旱可能即将结束，预示着未来几年该行业将迎来一波上市潮。【原文：Klarna Bank AB’s planned initial public offering is fueling hopes that a long drought of fintech listings may be coming to an end, heralding a wave of debuts for the sector over the next couple of years.】

item.title: 人权组织称肯尼亚教唆绑架外国持不同政见者
item.description: 在乌干达一名反对派领导人上周被带走之后，人权组织指责肯尼亚在引渡政治反对派方面与外国势力勾结的 "模式"。【原文：Human rights groups accused Kenya of a “pattern” of collaborating with foreign powers over the rendition of political opponents, after a Ugandan opposition leader was taken last week.】

item.title: 斯托纳拉斯称，欧洲央行应在每次会议上削减货币，直至达到 2% 的水平
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）认为，欧洲中央银行应在每次会议上降低借贷成本，直到达到既不限制也不刺激经济活动的水平。【原文：The European Central Bank should lower borrowing costs at each meeting until it reaches a level that neither restricts nor stimulates economic activity, according to Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）继续审查，埃及镑跌至 3 月以来最低点
item.description: 在新兴市场普遍抛售以及当地对美元需求增加的情况下，埃及镑跌至 3 月贬值以来的最低水平。【原文：Egypt’s pound has slipped to its lowest level since a devaluation in March, amid a broad sell-off in emerging markets and increased local demand for dollars.】

item.title: 苹果竞争对手 OPPO 寄望中国以外市场实现新增长
item.description: 中国智能手机制造商 OPPO 正在推动海外增长，以寻求新的收入来源，因为其国内市场正面临经济放缓和激烈竞争的困境。【原文：Chinese smartphone maker Oppo is pushing for overseas growth, seeking new revenue streams as its home market struggles with a slowing economy and intense competition.】

item.title: 清空公司在机场的主导地位可能即将终结
item.description:
这家科技公司现在已成为美国机场安检部门的一个 事实上的分支机构，但却面临着与 TSA、机场和客户之间的问题。【原文：

The tech company that’s now a de facto arm of US airport security has faced issues with the TSA, airports and customers.

】

item.title: 匈牙利在与乌克兰边境附近部署防空系统
item.description: 匈牙利计划将新购置的防空系统转移到与乌克兰接壤的边境附近，以应对俄罗斯对乌克兰战争升级可能造成的影响。【原文：Hungary plans to shift newly acquired air-defense systems close to its border with Ukraine as it braces for potential fallout from the escalation in Russia’s war on Ukraine.】

item.title: 渣打银行中国区杠杆融资主管萨姆即将离职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，渣打银行大中华区和北亚地区杠杆融资、收购融资和私人信贷主管 Vivian Sam 将离职。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc.’s head of leveraged, acquisition finance and private credit for Greater China and North Asia, Vivian Sam, will be leaving the bank, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 低风速加剧寒流，英国电价涨幅扩大
item.description: 由于寒冷天气刺激了供暖需求，而风力发电量将大幅下降，英国当日电力价格连续第二个交易日上涨。【原文：UK day-ahead power prices rose for a second session, with frigid weather boosting demand for heating and wind generation set to plunge.】

item.title: 南非称食物中毒是国家灾难
item.description: 在至少 22 名儿童死亡后，南非宣布一连串食物中毒事件为国家灾难。【原文：South Africa declared a spate of food poisonings a national disaster, following the death of at least 22 children.】

item.title: 斯塔默呼吁清除繁文缛节后，英国将批准更多交易
item.description: 在英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）呼吁监管机构削减繁文缛节以刺激经济增长之后，英国竞争监管机构正在研究在不损害消费者利益的情况下，以不同方式批准更多交易。【原文：The UK’s competition watchdog is looking at different ways it can clear more deals without harming consumers, after Prime Minister Keir Starmer called on regulators to cut red tape to spur growth.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 将招聘国家主管和交易员以推动印度市场发展
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Citadel Securities LLC 计划为其印度业务招聘一名主管，并增加更多的交易员，因为这家做市商巨头正在扩大其在全球最大股票市场之一的业务。【原文：Citadel Securities LLC plans to hire a head for its India operations and add more traders, according to people familiar with the matter, as the market-making giant expands its presence in one of the largest equity markets globally.】

item.title: PAG 据称将以 68 亿美元出售 Airpower 工业气体部门
item.description: 亚洲最大的另类资产管理公司之一 PAG 同意将 Airpower Technologies Ltd. 的工业气体业务出售给一家中国财团，交易价值 68 亿美元。【原文：PAG, one of Asia’s biggest alternative asset managers, agreed to sell the industrial gases business of Airpower Technologies Ltd. to a Chinese consortium in a deal valued at $6.8 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁欧盟，Pictet 将英国视为债券避风港
item.description: 欧洲最大的资产管理公司之一对英国债券持乐观态度，称在唐纳德-特朗普开始第二次担任美国总统后，英国债券的表现将远远好于欧元区同类债券。【原文：One of Europe’s biggest asset managers is upbeat on UK bonds, saying they will perform much better than euro-area peers after the start of Donald Trump’s second stint as US president.】

item.title: 在经济低迷时期，百度销售额出现两年来最大跌幅
item.description: 在中国经济萎靡不振削弱了百度在人工智能领域的发展后，百度公司创下了两年多来最大的营收降幅。【原文：Baidu Inc. recorded its biggest revenue drop in more than two years after China’s economic malaise undermined its push into generative AI.】

item.title: 奇货可居：Wested 谈中国如何加入全球资本主义（播客）
item.description: 中国是如何成为今天的经济巨人的？其中一个关键时刻显然是加入世贸组织。在此之前，邓小平领导的改革时代显然至关重要。但显然，没有任何一个事件或转折点能真正说明问题。在一本开创性的新书— 伟大的变革：中国从革命到改革之路》一书中，历史学家奥德-阿尔内-韦斯特德和陈健讲述了中国如何从一个贫困的、高度计划化的社区，发展成为一个拥有巨大发展潜力的国家的完整故事。【原文：How did China become the economic behemoth that it is today? One pivotal moment was, obviously, it’s ascension into the WTO. Prior to that, the era of reform under Deng Xiaoping was obviously crucial. But obviously no single event or turning point can really tell the story. In a groundbreaking new book — The Great Transformation: China’s Road from Revolution to Reform — historians Odd Arne Westad and Chen Jian tell the full story of how China went from being an impoverished, highly planned commu】
